attributes.action: Make filming the Police perfectly Legal without a license or a permit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It makes no sense as we pay their salary, with the money collected by Our taxes. And We should be perfectly entitled to film or take photographs without written authorization, because at the end of the day the police are here to serve everyone.
Without complicating matters with silly terror legislation that makes completely no sense to anyone, as You the British Government hasn't explained to us very well in the first place.
